duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintaining anesthesia service areas for use by Anesthesiologists and Anesthetists.
Accountability for anesthesia equipment and supplies.
Assisting Anesthesiologists with patient positioning and transport.
Preparation of sterile fields and placement of monitoring lines.
Application of anesthesia techniques and procedure setups.
Knowledge of infection control, health and safety policies and procedures.
Adherence to departmental policies and procedures, including telephone and house standards.

education_certification.credential: HS/GED or equivalent combination of education or experience and 6 months to 1 year previous experience as an Anesthesia Technician
